roleset.name: unable to wait, restless

role.descr: for what reason (if in addition to arg2)

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: -LRB- You probably think I 'm just impatient with bureaucracy , which I am , or that it 's a squabble about methods , and there 's certainly those , too .

example.name: all args
example.text: It didn't get impatient with him for being slow.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1.
